revised_title: The Existence and Characteristics of a Membrane Lining the Fossa Patellaris of the Corpus Vitreum
tldr: The author, T. P. Anderson Stuart, provides evidence for the existence of a membrane lining the fossa patellaris of the corpus vitreum, using chemical, optical, and mechanical methods. This membrane is distinct from the vitreous substance and has significant implications for understanding the structure and function of the eye.
